post:

Till 5th May

Dedicated servers

https://www.ovh.com/world/dedicated-servers/rise/prices/

Intel i7-6700K 
4c/ 8t - 4GHz/ 4.2GHz
32GB DDR4 2133MHz
2x2TB HDD SATA Soft RAID 
Bandwidth: 500 Mbps
**49.99€**

Available in FR / CA / PL datacenters
